comments.body:
```suggestion
        operator.execute(context=None)
```
just my preference - change it only if you agree :)

```suggestion
        deserialized_task = dag.task_dict[TASK_ID]
```

As we've currently got something else called SimpleTask and this isn't one of those.

It is just a task_id in tests specifically for Serialised Tests :D , does it matter? Happy to change the name but there are several places where the task_id is named simple_task. 

And I think we have SimpleTaskInstance and SimpleDagBag (that are soon to be removed too)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +481,485 @@
        dag = SerializedDAG.from_dict(serialized_dag)
        simple_task = dag.task_dict[TASK_ID]
        self.assertEqual(getattr(simple_task, "sql"),
                         ['SELECT * FROM test_table', 'SELECT * FROM test_table2'])
